description:
Martian forces have commenced their attack on the Earth. The Earth`s forces stand united, ready to defend against the attack as cities quickly turn into war zones. Inaho and his classmates must struggle to survive as they find themselves being thrown into danger.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikyuu no Ichiban Nagai Hi: Beyond the Horizon
Le jour le plus long de la Terre
地球の一番長い日 -Beyond the Horizon-
